Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Dermaseptin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Possesses a potent antimicrobial activity against Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria. Probably acts by disturbing membrane functions with its amphipathic structure.

Literature.Title: Structure, synthesis, and molecular cloning of dermaseptins B, a family of skin peptide antibiotics.
Literature.Author: Charpentier S, Amiche M, Mester J, Vouille V, Le Caer JP, Nicolas P, Delfour A.
